items.title: Victoria Peak
items.description: Experience panoramic views of Hong Kong from its highest point.

items.title: Star Ferry
items.address: Star Ferry Pier, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
items.description: Enjoy a scenic ride across Victoria Harbour on the historic Star Ferry.

items.title: Tsim Sha Tsui Promenade
items.address: Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong
items.description: Stroll along the waterfront and admire the stunning skyline of Hong Kong.

items.title: Mong Kok Market
items.description: Explore vibrant street markets and sample authentic local cuisine.

items.title: Temple Street Night Market
items.description: Experience the lively energy and flavors of one of Hong Kong's famed night markets.

items.title: Hong Kong Disneyland
items.description: Dive into a magical world of fun and wonder at Hong Kong Disneyland.

items.title: Big Buddha
items.address: Ngong Ping, Lantau Island, Hong Kong
items.description: Visit the majestic Tian Tan Buddha and enjoy a peaceful atmosphere.

items.title: Man Mo Temple
items.description: Discover ancient traditions at this historic temple in the heart of the city.

items.title: Wong Tai Sin Temple
items.address: Wong Tai Sin, Kowloon, Hong Kong
items.description: A vibrant temple renowned for its fortune telling and cultural significance.

items.title: Avenue of Stars
items.address: Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong
items.description: Celebrate Hong Kongâ€™s film industry along this picturesque promenade.

items.title: Ocean Park
items.description: Enjoy thrilling rides, animal exhibits, and spectacular views at Ocean Park.

items.title: Symphony of Lights
items.description: Marvel at the dazzling nighttime light show that illuminates the city's skyline.

items.title: Kowloon Walled City Park
items.description: Explore the historical site of the former walled city now transformed into a serene park.

items.title: Ten Thousand Buddhas Monastery
items.description: Admire thousands of Buddha statues in this unique and tranquil monastery setting.

items.title: Golden Bauhinia Square
items.description: Visit this iconic square that celebrates Hong Kong's heritage.
